item.title: 市监局：反对厂商「内卷」、亏本卖车
item.guid: 市监局：反对厂商「内卷」、亏本卖车
item.description:
On February 12, the State Administration for Market Regulation released the "Compliance Guidelines for Price Behavior in the Automobile Industry" to further regulate price behavior in the automobile industry and promote the healthy and orderly development of the automotive market. 2 月 12 日，市场监管总局发布《汽车行业价格行为合规指南》，进一步规范汽车行业价格行为，促进汽车市场健康有序发展。

According to Xinhua News Agency, there are currently some irregularities in the automotive industry. The guidelines are based on the current development reality of the automotive industry, further clarify behavioral boundaries, unify regulatory rules, guide automobile production and sales enterprises to operate legally and compliantly, and promote the formation of a market order characterized by high quality, fair prices, and healthy competition. 据新华网报道，当前，汽车行业存在一些乱象，指南立足当前汽车行业发展实际，进一步明晰行为边界，统一监管规则，引导汽车生产和销售企业依法合规经营，推动形成优质优价、良性竞争的市场秩序。

These guidelines mainly include: 本次指南主要包括：

    Clarify overall principles and requirements: Define the purpose, basis, and scope of application for the guidelines, stipulate the basic principles that pricing behavior should follow, and encourage industry associations to strengthen self-regulation and promote industry price compliance.

    Refine pricing behavior norms for automobile manufacturers: Clarify price compliance requirements for all stages, from complete vehicle to component production, and from pricing strategies to sales behavior. Implement full-process price management, strengthen fair pricing constraints, standardize promotional and pricing behaviors, and lawfully combat unfair pricing practices.

    Clarify pricing behavior requirements for automobile sales enterprises: Focus on the new car sales segment, striving to regulate prominent issues such as failure to clearly mark prices as required and false promotions. Establish a risk warning mechanism, encouraging platforms to provide dual warnings for operational and consumer risks regarding significantly low-priced behaviors.

    Guide enterprises to strengthen internal compliance construction: Encourage automobile production and sales enterprises to establish internal price compliance management mechanisms, including 6 mechanisms: price decision-making, sales contract management, internal supervision, price emergency response, risk prevention and control, and price compliance training, to achieve full-process control of pricing behavior.

The guidelines specifically mention: 指南其中具体提到：

In addition to lawfully reducing prices to clear overstocked goods, automobile manufacturers face significant legal risks if they engage in the following pricing behaviors with the aim of excluding competitors or monopolizing the market:

    Using means such as passing off high specifications/grades as low specifications/grades to covertly lower prices, making the actual ex-factory price lower than its production cost;

    Covertly lowering prices through methods such as providing extra quantities or bulk discounts, making the actual ex-factory price lower than its production cost;

    Using other methods to make the actual ex-factory price lower than its production cost.

Automobile manufacturers should regulate the charging behavior for "paid unlock" features:

    For features with a free trial period, the free period, subsequent charging standards, and other details should be disclosed at the time of sale, and consumers should be reminded again before the free period ends;

    For differentiated value-added features that require a fee, this should be clearly communicated at the time of sale; differentiated value-added features not clearly communicated may not be charged for.

Automobile sales enterprises face significant legal risks if they use the following false or misleading pricing methods to deceive consumers:

    Using deceptive or misleading language, text, numbers, images, or videos to indicate prices and other pricing information;

    Using false "market price," "manufacturer's suggested retail price," "market reference price," or other comparative prices for promotion;

    Using car loans, insurance purchases, etc., as additional pricing conditions without informing or prominently displaying them before the transaction;

    Refusing to fulfill or incompletely fulfilling price commitments without legitimate reasons, making promises regarding car prices, gift values, after-sales service fees, etc., but failing to deliver;

    Attracting consumers through low-price promotions when there are actually no related products for sale.

item.title: OpenAI 发布新款实时编程模型
item.guid: OpenAI-发布新款实时编程模型
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI announced the release of a new real-time programming model, "GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark." 今天凌晨，OpenAI 宣布发布新款 实时编程 模型「GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark」。

Officially, GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark is a more compact version of GPT-5.3-Codex, and the launch of this model marks OpenAI's first collaboration milestone with AI chip startup Cerebras. 官方表示，GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark 是 GPT-5.3-Codex 更小巧的版本，并且本次模型的推出，标志着 OpenAI 与 AI 芯片初创公司 Cerebras 达成首个合作里程碑。

It's worth noting that Cerebras is considered a challenger to Nvidia, specifically created to solve AI inference speed and latency issues. 值得一提的是，Cerebras 被视为英伟达的挑战者，专门为了解决 AI 推理速度和延迟问题而生。

OpenAI officially states that Codex-Spark is optimized to provide near-instant responses when running on ultra-low-latency hardware— generating over 1000 tokens per second , while maintaining powerful capabilities in practical programming tasks. OpenAI 官方介绍，Codex-Spark 经过优化，在超低延迟硬件上运行时能提供近乎即时的响应—— 每秒可生成超过 1000 个 token ，同时在实际编程任务中保持强大的能力。

At its initial release, Codex-Spark features a 128k context window and currently only supports text input . During the research preview, Codex-Spark will have separate rate limits, and its usage will not count towards standard rate limits. 在发布初期，Codex-Spark 拥有 128k 上下文窗口 ，目前仅支持 文本输入 。在研究预览期间，Codex-Spark 将有独立的速率限制，其使用量不会计入标准速率限制。

In terms of performance, in the SWE-Bench Pro benchmark test, Codex-Spark's accuracy is slightly lower than the full GPT-5.3-Codex, but it significantly reduces task time (several times faster) and performs notably better than GPT-5.1-Codex-mini. 性能表现上，在 SWE-Bench Pro 基准测试中， Codex-Spark 在准确率上虽略低于完整的 GPT-5.3-Codex，但在任务耗时上大幅缩短（快数倍），且性能显著优于 GPT-5.1-Codex-mini。

It's worth noting that this GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark runs on Cerebras's Wafer Scale Engine 3 (WSE-3) . According to reports, the WSE-3 boasts 4 trillion transistors and 900,000 AI cores , providing extremely low latency for Codex-Spark. 值得关注的是，本次 GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark 运行在 Cerebras 的 Wafer Scale Engine 3（WSE-3） 上。而据介绍， WSE-3 拥有 4 万亿个晶体管 和 90 万个 AI 核心，并且能为 Codex-Spark 提供极低延迟。

GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark is currently available as a research preview for ChatGPT Pro users. GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark 目前已作为 研究预览版 向 ChatGPT Pro 用户推出。

item.title: 马斯克评价 Seedance 2.0：发展太猛了
item.guid: 马斯克评价-Seedance-2.0：发展太猛了
item.description:
Recently, ByteDance launched its latest video generation model, Seedream 2.0, which has garnered significant attention for its excellent image quality consistency and coherent camera performance. 日前，字节跳动上线了旗下最新视频生成模型 Seedream 2.0，并以优秀的画质一致性、连贯的镜头表现等优点获得极高的关注。

And yesterday, Elon Musk retweeted a video generated by Seedance 2.0, exclaiming, "It's happening fast." 而在昨日，马斯克转发了一条由 Seedance 2.0 生成的视频内容，并感叹「发展得也太快了」（It’s happening fast）。

Also yesterday, director Jia Zhangke posted, "Seedance 2.0 is indeed impressive, I'm planning to make a short film with it." Luo Yonghao then retweeted it, exclaiming, "Filming... making a movie only requires one director now." 同在昨日，导演贾樟柯发文称「Seedance 2.0 确实厉害，我准备用它做个短片。」随后罗永浩转发并直呼「拍……做一个电影只需要导演一个人了」。

As early as February 9th, Feng Ji, the producer of "Black Myth: Wukong" and founder of Game Science, also posted his comments on Seedance 2.0: 早在 2 月 9 日，《黑神话：悟空》制作人、游戏科学创始人冯骥也发文评价了 Seedance 2.0：

Currently the strongest video generation model on the planet, bar none; AI's ability to understand and integrate multimodal information (text, images, video, audio) has made a leap, which is astonishing; the production cost of general videos will no longer follow the traditional logic of the film and television industry, gradually approaching the marginal cost of computing power. The content field will undoubtedly usher in unprecedented inflation, and traditional organizational structures and production processes will be completely reconfigured.

Feng Ji also mentioned that AI video will become popularized, and video itself will gradually evolve towards customization, real-time interaction, and gamification, "perhaps becoming a completely new form of entertainment in the future." 冯骥还提到，AI 视频将迎来全民化，并且视频本身会逐渐向定制化、实时化、游戏化演进，「也许会成为未来某种全新的娱乐方式。」

At the same time, he also emphasized that as video models become increasingly powerful, the situation of "fake video proliferation and trust crisis" will worsen. He stated that realistic fake videos will become barrier-free, and existing intellectual property and censorship systems will face unprecedented challenges. 同时其也强调，如今视频模型越来越强，「假视频泛滥与信任危机」的情况也将会加重。其表示，因为逼真的假视频将变得毫无门槛，而现有的知识产权与审查体系会面临空前冲击。

It is reported that Seedance 2.0 can create cinematic videos based on text or images. It employs a dual-branch diffusion transformer architecture to generate both video and audio simultaneously. By simply writing a detailed prompt or uploading an image, Seedance 2.0 can generate multi-shot sequence videos with native audio within 60 seconds. 据悉，Seedance 2.0 可根据文本或图像创建电影级视频。其采用双分支扩散变换器架构，可同时生成视频和音频。只需编写详细的提示或上传一张图片，Seedance 2.0 即可在 60 秒内生成带有原生音频的多镜头序列视频。

It's worth noting that this model's unique multi-shot narrative feature can automatically generate multiple interconnected scenes based on a single prompt. AI automatically maintains consistency in characters, visual style, and atmosphere across all scene transitions, eliminating the need for manual editing. 值得一提的是，值得一提的是，这款模型独有的多镜头叙事功能，能够根据单个提示自动生成多个相互关联的场景。AI 会自动保持所有场景切换中角色、视觉风格和氛围的一致性，无需手动编辑。

item.title: 松典相机加入 M43 阵营
item.description:
Yesterday, OM Digital Solutions (Olympus) released a press release announcing: 昨日，奥林巴斯奥之心数字科技发布新闻稿宣布：

Shenzhen Sonida Digital Technology Co., Ltd. (Sonida) has officially joined the M4/3 System (Micro Four Thirds) standard camp.

Subsequently, Sonida Camera stated: 随后，松典相机方面表示：

We extend our sincerest respect to industry pioneers such as OM Digital Solutions and Panasonic, who initiated and continue to promote the M43 (Micro Four Thirds) standard, as well as all partners who contribute to this open ecosystem.

We are deeply honored to join the M43 alliance and recognize this as immense encouragement. We pledge to always learn from our peers with humility, move forward together, encourage each other, and collectively build a more vibrant future for imaging.

According to Songdian's previous official announcement, it is highly likely to launch a digital camera with an M43 sensor. 据松典此前的官宣内容显示，其大概率将推出 M43 传感器的数码相机。

Many netizens have also started to plan a path for Songdian: directly challenging Panasonic head-on – if Panasonic has GX9, then make a GX10. 其中有不少网友也开始给松典想好路子了：直接对着松下贴脸开大——人家有 GX9，那就弄个 GX10 出来。

item.title: 多车企披露全固态电池产业规划方案
item.guid: 多车企披露全固态电池产业规划方案
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, following the announcement that Part 1 of the national standard for automotive solid-state batteries is planned for release in July this year, several vehicle and battery companies, including Geely, Chery, BYD, and Sunwanda, have recently disclosed their respective technical roadmaps and industrial planning for all-solid-state batteries: 据财联社报道，继车用固态电池第 1 部分国标明确拟于今年 7 月发布后，近日，包括吉利、奇瑞及比亚迪、欣旺达等在内的多家整车和电池企业披露了各自全固态电池的技术路径和产业规划方案：

Geely Auto:

It has laid out three major technical routes in the field of all-solid-state batteries, adopting composite solutions of polymers (organic), sulfides, and halides (inorganic), targeting different application market demands. 在全固态电池领域布局了三大技术路线，采用聚合物 (有机)、硫化物和卤化物 (无机) 复合方案，面向不同的应用市场需求。

At the same time, Geely Auto has developed high-nickel ternary cathode materials specifically for all-solid-state batteries and composite electrolytes with flame-retardant and self-extinguishing functions, and has invented in-situ lithium dendrite re-embedding repair technology, among others. 同时，吉利汽车开发出面向全固态电池专用的高镍三元正极材料和具备阻燃及自熄功能的复合电解质，发明了原位锂枝晶回嵌修复技术等。

In terms of application planning, according to Shen Yuan, Senior Vice President and CTO of Geely Holding, Geely Auto's short-term goal is to complete the debut of prototype vehicles in 2026; in 2027, achieve small-batch industrialization of all-solid-state batteries, with demonstration operation vehicles reaching 1,000 units; the long-term goal is to complete the industrial layout of all-solid-state batteries by 2030 and launch them in mass production on high-end models. 在应用规划方面，据吉利控股高级副总裁兼 CTO 沈源透露，吉利汽车的短期目标是在 2026 年完成样车首发；2027 年全固态电池实现小批量产业化、整车示范运营车辆达到 1000 台；长期目标是在 2030 年完成全固态电池的产业化布局，并在高端车型上批量上市。

By then, Geely's all-solid-state battery cell energy density is expected to exceed 500Wh/kg, and BOM costs will be controlled within 0.6 yuan/Wh. 届时，吉利全固态电池电芯能量密度有望突破 500Wh/kg、BOM 成本控制在 0.6 元/Wh 以内。

Chery Auto:

Gu Chunshan, Vice President of Chery Auto, recently stated that the company plans to achieve 0.5GWh pilot line production and PACK sample package off-line in 2026, complete continuous production of 60Ah-class all-solid-state battery cells, and simultaneously strengthen supply chain system construction; in 2027, officially launch all-solid-state battery vehicle demonstration work, promoting technology from production lines to real-vehicle verification, and gradually achieving large-scale application. 奇瑞汽车副总裁古春山近日表示，公司计划 2026 年实现 0.5GWh 中试线投产、PACK 样包下线，完成 60Ah 级全固态电芯的连续化生产，同步强化供应链体系建设；2027 年正式启动全固态电池装车示范工作，推动技术从产线走向实车验证，逐步实现规模化应用落地。

FAW Group:

Earlier news indicated that the first prototype vehicle of its self-developed Hongqi all-solid-state battery officially rolled off the production line in January this year, achieving a series of phased breakthroughs in key aspects such as sulfide electrolytes, 10Ah cell performance, and 60Ah cell technology. 稍早前消息，其自主研发的红旗全固态电池首台样车已于今年 1 月正式下线，在硫化物电解质、10Ah 电芯性能、60Ah 电芯工艺等关键环节取得一系列阶段性突破。

The Hongqi all-solid-state battery 66Ah cell, which has undergone vehicle verification, successfully passed the 200℃ extreme thermal abuse test, and the ionic conductivity of the sulfide electrolyte exceeded 10mS/cm. 实现上车验证的红旗全固态电池 66Ah 电芯成功通过 200℃ 极端热滥用测试，硫化物电解质的离子电导率突破 10mS/cm。

BYD:

The Investor Relations Department recently disclosed that the company regards sulfide solid-state batteries as an important technical direction, and solid-state batteries have achieved breakthroughs in areas such as battery life and fast charging, with small-batch production expected by 2027. 投资者关系部近日披露，公司以硫化物固态电池作为重要技术方向，固态电池在电池寿命、快充等领域实现突破，有望 2027 年实现小批量生产。

On February 2, Sunwanda replied on the investor interaction platform regarding the company's battery progress, stating that its first and second-generation semi-solid-state batteries have achieved mass production, and all-solid-state batteries are expected to achieve mass production in 2027. 2 月 2 日，欣旺达在投资者互动平台针对公司电池进展予以回复时称，公司第一代、第二代半固态电池已实现规模化生产，2027 年全固态电池有望实现量产。

item.title: 消息称魅族手机业务即将解散
item.guid: 消息称魅族手机业务即将解散
item.description:
Meizu 22

According to Sina Technology, some netizens recently revealed that the Meizu 23 project has been halted, and Meizu's mobile phone business is about to be disbanded. 据新浪科技消息，日前有网友爆料称魅族 23 项目已经停止，魅族手机业务即将解散。

Meizu has not yet responded to the above situation; however, Meizu customer service stated that they have not received any relevant notifications. 针对上述情况，魅族方面暂无回应；而魅族客服则对此表示，未有接到相关的通知。

Previously, during the 2026 Meiyou New Year's Gala event, Meizu announced that it would release the Meizu 23 phone in 2026, stating that the model would have an improved feel, feature Meizu's narrowest bezels ever, but would no longer come with a white panel. Meizu had previously revealed that the Meizu 23 was planned for a mid-year launch. 此前，在 2026 魅友新春会活动中，魅族宣布 2026 年将发布魅族 23 手机，称该机型手感将更进一步，搭载魅族史上最窄边框，但不再搭载白面板。魅族方面曾透露，魅族 23 计划年中上市。

Additionally, Meizu announced at the time that the Meizu 22Air's listing plan was canceled, citing the impact of a significant increase in memory prices as the reason. 另外，魅族当时宣布魅族 22Air 取消上市计划，给出的原因为内存价格大幅上涨的冲击。

item.title: 影石年会送出五套房，CEO 回应
item.guid: 影石年会送出五套房，CEO-回应
item.description:
Recently, Insta360 has garnered significant external attention due to 'gifting houses' at its annual meeting. 日前，影石 Insta 360 因年会现场「送房」，备受外界关注。

It is reported that Insta360 gave away 5 commercial properties at this year's annual meeting, with all winners being post-90s generation, averaging less than 32 years old; additionally, 6 popular car models such as Porsche, BMW, and Tesla were given as choices, totaling 33 cars with a cumulative value exceeding 10 million yuan. 据悉，影石在今年年会现场送出 5 套商品房，获奖者均为 90 后，平均年龄不到 32 岁；此外还送出保时捷、宝马、特斯拉等热门车型 6 台自选，累计共送出 33 辆车，总价值超 1000 万。

Yesterday, Insta360 CEO Liu Jingkang posted, stating: 昨日，影石 CEO 刘靖康发文表示：

Many times, inspiring high-end talent relies on a sense of accomplishment, honor, or value resonance, but direct material incentives are also very important.

It's worth mentioning that, according to The Paper, Liu Jingkang also showcased the dual-camera appearance of Insta360's first handheld gimbal camera at the annual meeting, officially naming the product 'Luna'; the new camera will feature telephoto capabilities. 值得一提的是，据澎湃新闻消息，刘靖康还在影石年会现场展示了影石首款手持云台相机的双摄外观，并该产品正式命名为「Luna」；新相机将配备长焦功能。

"This is definitely not another Pocket (DJI's gimbal camera product)," Liu Jingkang stated, "This is a product with many innovative definitions and reforms. The core of innovation is to solve problems that others have not yet solved, rather than simply creating a new cost-effective product." 「这绝不是另一个 Pocket（大疆旗下云台相机产品），」刘靖康表示，「这是一款有非常多创新定义跟革新的产品，创新的核心是解决别人尚未解决的问题，而非单纯做一款新的性价比产品。」

item.title: 荣耀前 CEO 赵明加入千里科技
item.guid: 荣耀前-CEO-赵明加入千里科技
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhao Ming, former CEO of Honor Terminal Co., Ltd., announced his official joining of Qianli Technology, an AI tech company. 昨日，前荣耀终端股份有限公司 CEO 赵明宣布，正式加入 AI 科技企业千里科技。

Zhao Ming stated, "I am very honored to have the opportunity to join Qianli Technology, a career I can dedicate ten years to. I look forward to working hand-in-hand with Yin Qi (Chairman of Qianli Technology) to build an AI business closed-loop and help Qianli soar." Yin Qi also expressed, "Welcome, Zhao Ming." 赵明表示，「非常荣幸有缘际会千里科技，一个可以奋斗十年的事业，期待与印奇（千里科技董事长）兄弟携手一起打造 AI 商业闭环，助力千里腾飞。」印奇方面也表示，「欢迎赵明」。

It is reported that Zhao Ming announced his official resignation via a Weibo post on January 17, 2025. He stated in Honor's internal community at the time that he chose to resign due to poor health caused by high-intensity work. 据悉，赵明于 2025 年 1 月 17 日微博发文宣布正式离职。其当时在荣耀内部社区表示，因高强度的工作导致身体情况不佳而选择离职。

According to Jiemian News, after Zhao Ming joins Qianli Technology, he will serve as Co-Chairman and will also be nominated as a non-independent director candidate for the company's sixth board of directors. 而据界面新闻报道， 赵明加入千里科技后，将任联席董事长，同时被推选为公司第六届董事会非独立董事候选人。

It is understood that Qianli Technology is an AI tech company that transformed from a manufacturing enterprise. In November 2024, Yin Qi, a prominent figure in China's AI field, was appointed Chairman of Lifan Technology. In January 2025, Yin Qi proposed a comprehensive 'AI+Vehicle' strategy, and in February, the company was officially renamed Qianli Technology. 据了解，千里科技是一家由制造业企业转型而来的 AI 科技企业。2024 年 11 月，中国人工智能领域代表人物印奇出任力帆科技董事长。2025 年 1 月，印奇提出全面拥抱「AI+车」战略，2 月公司正式更名为千里科技。

Before joining Qianli Technology, Zhao Ming had resigned as Honor CEO and taken a year-long break, during which there were many rumors in the industry about his whereabouts. 在加⼊千⾥科技之前，赵明已经卸任荣耀 CEO 并休整了⼀年时间，期间业内有不少关于赵明去向的风声。

In September 2025, he revealed at a university event that he was still following the industry, and there were things that excited him even more, including 'things worth investing another ten years or even longer into, compared to what I did at Honor before.' 2025 年 9 月，他曾在一场高校活动中透露，自己仍在关注行业，其中有让自己更加兴奋的东西，包括「相比之前做荣耀，值得我再去投入十年甚至更久的时间去做的事」。

Insiders revealed that regarding the future division of labor at Qianli Technology, Yin Qi will focus more on grasping the development strategy of AI technology, while Zhao Ming will prioritize advancing the closed-loop strategy of AI business models. 知情人士透露，对于千里科技的未来分工，印奇将更侧重于把握 AI 科技的发展战略，赵明则将重点推进 AI 商业模式的闭环战略。

item.title: 联想最新财报公布：AI 收入同比增长 72%
item.guid: 联想最新财报公布：AI-收入同比增长-72%
item.description:
Yesterday, Lenovo Group announced its third-quarter results for the 2025/26 fiscal year, as of December 31, 2025: 昨日，联想集团公布截至 2025 年 12 月 31 日的 2025/26 财年第三财季业绩：

    Group revenue reached 157.5 billion RMB, an increase of over 18% year-on-year, significantly exceeding market consensus expectations and setting a new historical high;

    Adjusted net profit increased by 36% year-on-year, far exceeding market expectations, with profit growth reaching twice the revenue growth, demonstrating Lenovo Group's resilience and certainty in consistently delivering on its commitments in a complex environment.

The official statement indicated that over the past quarter, the global AI industry chain faced multiple challenges, including rapidly rising prices of key components like storage chips, intensified supply and demand fluctuations, and doubts about the sustainability of the AI cycle. 官方表示，过去一个季度，全球 AI 产业链面临存储芯片等关键元器件价格快速上行、供需波动加剧、AI 周期可持续性受质疑等多重挑战。

Lenovo not only delivered on its previously clearly communicated commitment to 'double-digit revenue growth and profitability,' but also, leveraging its comprehensive advantages in supply chain management, operational capabilities, and overall resilience, positively responded to external concerns with a 'walk the talk' report card. 而联想不仅兑现了此前向市场明确释放的「收入双位数增长并盈利」承诺，还凭借自身在供应链管理、运营能力与整体韧性上的综合优势，以一份「说到做到」的成绩单正面回应了外界关切。

It is worth mentioning that AI-related businesses have become an important growth engine for Lenovo Group: 值得一提的是，AI 相关业务已成为联想集团重要增长引擎：

In the third fiscal quarter, Lenovo's AI-related revenue increased by 72% year-on-year, and its proportion of the group's total revenue rose to 32%.

Among them, AI PC revenue achieved high double-digit growth, AI smartphone revenue achieved triple-digit growth, AI server revenue achieved high double-digit growth, and AI service revenue achieved triple-digit growth, driving the group's business structure to continue evolving towards high-value directions. 其中，AI PC 营收实现高双位数增长，AI 智能手机营收实现三位数增长，AI 服务器营收实现高双位数增长，AI 服务营收实现了三位数增长，推动集团业务结构持续向高价值方向演进。

item.title: 💡 DeepMind CEO：AI 在未来十五年会解决人类棘手难题
item.guid: 💡-DeepMind-CEO：AI-在未来十五年会解决人类棘手难题
item.description:
Recently, Demis Hassabis, CEO of Google DeepMind, mentioned in an interview with Fortune magazine: 近日，Google DeepMind CEO 德米斯 · 哈萨比斯接受《财富》杂志的采访时，其提到：

Humanity stands on the cusp of a "new golden age of scientific discovery." Although the next 10 to 15 years will see intense industry upheaval and growing pains, it will ultimately usher in a technological revolution comparable to the "Renaissance."

Hassabis introduced the concept of "radical abundance" in the interview. He predicted that AI, by deeply internalizing scientific methods, will solve humanity's most intractable problems: 哈萨比斯在访谈中提出了「激进富足」的概念。他预言 AI 将通过对科学方法的深度内化，解决人类最棘手的难题：

    Medical Revolution: Within the next 15 years, AI will make personalized medicine the norm and conquer major diseases.

    Energy Breakthrough: AI will accelerate the research and development of nuclear fusion and new solar materials, completely solving the energy crisis.

    Space Exploration: Breakthroughs in computing power will ultimately enable humanity to "travel between stars and explore the Milky Way."

During the interview, Hassabis also mentioned some of the risks and challenges Google faces in today's AI landscape. 采访中，哈萨比斯也提到了 Google 在当今 AI 圈的一些风险以及挑战。

Facing the rise of competitors like OpenAI, Hassabis admitted that Google must confront the "innovator's dilemma." He emphasized: " If we don't disrupt ourselves, someone else will. You'd better do it on your own terms. " 面对 OpenAI 等竞争对手的崛起，哈萨比斯坦言谷歌必须面临「创新者困境」。他强调：「 如果我们不进行自我颠覆，别人就会动手。你最好按自己的节奏来。 」

It is reported that with the release of the Gemini series models and the Nano Banana image generation model, Alphabet (Google's parent company) stock soared by about 65% last year. Hassabis believes the company has crossed the "watershed" of AI assistants aiding advanced research. 据悉，随着 Gemini 系列模型及 Nano Banana 图像生成模型的发布，Alphabet（Google 母公司）股价在去年飙升约 65%，哈萨比斯认为公司已跨越了 AI 助手辅助高阶研究的「分水岭」。

item.title: 豆包 2.0 被曝 2 月 14 日发布
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, ByteDance's Volcano Engine has tentatively set February 14, 2026, for the release of a series of important upgrades to its Doubao large model. 据财联社报道，字节跳动火山引擎初步确定 2026 年 2 月 14 日发布豆包大模型的一系列重要升级发布。

The report states that this model release involves Doubao Large Model 2.0, audio and video creation model Seedance 2.0, and image creation model Seedream 5.0 Lite. 报道称， 本次模型发布涉及豆包大模型 2.0、音视频创作模型 Seedance 2.0、图像创作模型 Seedream 5.0 Lite。

With this upgrade, Doubao Large Model 2.0 will be officially released, and its foundational model capabilities and enterprise-level Agent capabilities will be significantly enhanced. 此次升级，豆包大模型 2.0 将正式发布，基础模型能力和企业级 Agent 能力将有大幅提升。

According to an earlier report by LatePost, the Doubao 2.0 model is the most core output since Wu Yonghui (ByteDance Seed's head of foundational research) took over Seed a year ago. It is a multimodal model similar to Gemini, with 1 trillion parameters, and is the largest model trained by Seed since its inception. 据此前晚点 LatePost 报道，豆包 2.0 模型是吴永辉（字节 Seed 基础研究负责人）接管 Seed 一年最核心的产出。它是一款类似 Gemini 的多模态模型，10000 亿参数，是 Seed 成立以来训练的最大模型。

Seed personnel revealed through reports that this model encountered infrastructure-level challenges during training. They analyzed that Seed had relatively neglected foundational capability building during its continuous catch-up over the past two years, leading to instability when scaling up parameters during Doubao 2.0 training, making progress difficult at one point. 有 Seed 人士通过报道透露，这款模型训练期间遇到基础设施层面的挑战。他们分析，过去两年 Seed 持续追赶期间，相对忽视了基础能力建设，所以训练豆包 2.0 期间扩大参数规模时不稳定，一度难以推进。

It is understood that after encountering problems during Doubao 2.0 training, multiple teams eventually collaborated for 3 months, mainly addressing issues from model architecture and training data to ensure the model was launched before the Spring Festival. 据悉，训练豆包 2.0 遇到问题后，最终多个团队配合，花了 3 个月时间，主要从模型架构、训练数据等方面入手解决问题，确保模型赶在春节前上线。

item.title: 小米开源首代机器人 VLA 大模型
item.guid: 小米开源首代机器人-VLA-大模型
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi officially released its first-generation robot VLA large model, Xiaomi-Robotics-0. Founder Lei Jun then reposted it, stating " 昨日，小米正式对外发布首代机器人 VLA 大模型 Xiaomi-Robotics-0。随后创办人雷军转发并表示「

Xiaomi started laying out its robotics business very early." 小米很早开始布局机器人业务」。

According to reports, Xiaomi-Robotics-0 is an open-source VLA model with 4.7 billion parameters, combining visual-language understanding with high-performance real-time execution capabilities. 据介绍，Xiaomi-Robotics-0 是一个拥有 47 亿参数、兼具视觉语言理解与高性能实时执行能力的开源 VLA 模型。

The official statement indicates that Xiaomi-Robotics-0 not only achieved excellent results in three major mainstream simulation tests but also realized the generalization of physical intelligence in real-world machine tasks—with coherent actions, sensitive reactions, and the ability to perform real-time inference on consumer-grade graphics cards. 官方表示， Xiaomi-Robotics-0 不仅在三大主流的仿真测试中获得优异成绩，更在现实真机任务中实现了物理智能的泛化——动作连贯、反应灵敏，且能在消费级显卡上实现实时推理。

The model adopts the mainstream Mixture-of-Transformers (MoT) architecture, equipped with a "Visual Language Brain (VLM) + Action Expert Cerebellum" combination. The official statement claims that the model can not only understand instructions but also maintain extremely high physical flexibility during action execution, just like humans. 模型采用主流的 Mixture-of-Transformers (MoT) 架构，配备「视觉语言大脑（VLM）+动作执行小脑（Action Expert）」组合。官方称，模型既能听懂指令，又能像人类一样，在动作执行时保持极高的物理灵活性。

In terms of performance, Xiaomi-Robotics-0 has achieved several SOTA (State-of-the-Art) results: 性能方面，Xiaomi-Robotics-0 刷新多项 SOTA：

    In LIBERO, CALVIN, and SimplerEnv tests, the model achieved the current best results across all benchmarks and in comparisons with 30 different models.

    The model retains VLM's inherent multimodal understanding capabilities, performing exceptionally well, especially in embodied-related benchmarks.

Technical Homepage: https://xiaomi-robotics-0.github.io 技术主页： https://xiaomi-robotics-0.github.io

Open-source Code: https://github.com/XiaomiRobotics/Xiaomi-Robotics-0 开源代码： https://github.com/XiaomiRobotics/Xiaomi-Robotics-0

Model Weights: https://huggingface.co/XiaomiRobotics 模型权重： https://huggingface.co/XiaomiRobotics

item.title: MiniMax 上线新旗舰编程模型 M2.5
item.description:
Recently, MiniMax officially launched its new model M2.5 in MiniMax Agent. It is reported that MiniMax M2.5 is a flagship programming model. 近日，MiniMax 正式在其 MiniMax Agent 中提供全新模型 M2.5。据悉，MiniMax M2.5 为一款旗舰编程模型。

According to reports, MiniMax M2.5 has achieved or surpassed industry SOTA in productivity scenarios such as programming, tool calling and search, and office work, for example, SWE-Bench Verified (80.2%), Multi-SWE-Bench (51.3%), and BrowseComp (76.3%). 据介绍，MiniMax M2.5 在编程、工具调用和搜索、办公等生产力场景都达到或者刷新了行业的 SOTA，比如 SWE-Bench Verified（80.2%），Multi-SWE-Bench（51.3%），BrowseComp（76.3%）。

It is worth mentioning that in core programming tests, M2.5 showed significant improvement compared to the previous generation model (M2.1), reaching a level similar to the Claude Opus series. In multilingual-related tasks on Multi-SWE-Bench, M2.5 even achieved first place. 值得一提的是，在编程的核心测试中，M2.5 相比于上一代模型（M2.1）有了显著提升，达到了跟 Claude Opus 系列类似的水平。在多语言相关的任务 Multi-SWE-Bench 上，M2.5 更是达到了第一。

In terms of parameter performance, the M2.5 model has an active parameter count of only 10B, demonstrating significant advantages in memory footprint and inference energy efficiency ratio. It supports an ultra-high throughput of 100 TPS, with inference speeds surpassing international top models. 参数表现上，M2.5 模型激活参数量仅 10B，在显存占用和推理能效比上优势明显，支持 100 TPS 超高吞吐量，推理速度超国际顶尖模型。

Regarding cost, the official statement claims that M2.5 is the first cutting-edge model that can be used infinitely without considering usage costs. When outputting 100 tokens per second, M2.5 only costs $1 for one hour of continuous operation; and when outputting 50 tokens per second, it only costs $0.3. 成本方面，官方称 M2.5 是第一个不需要考虑使用成本可以无限使用的前沿模型。在每秒输出 100 token 的情况下，M2.5 连续工作一小时只需花费 1 美金；而在每秒输出 50 个 token 的情况下，只需要 0.3 美金。

It is worth noting that during yesterday's trading session, MiniMax's share price once surged by over 20%, with its total market capitalization exceeding HKD 180 billion. 值得一提的是，在昨日盘中，MiniMax 涨幅一度超过 20%，总市值超 1800 亿港元。

item.title: 多家第三方火车票销售平台被约谈
item.guid: 多家第三方火车票销售平台被约谈
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, the Beijing Municipal Administration for Market Regulation recently organized an administrative interview with 12 mainstream platforms involved in online train ticket sales, including Ctrip, Qunar, Fliggy, Tongcheng, Meituan, JD.com, TravelSky, Gaotie Guanjia, Didi, Amap, Baidu Maps, and Tencent Maps. The meeting focused on prominent issues in online train ticket sales that have drawn strong public complaints. 据界面新闻消息，近日，北京市市场监督管理局组织携程、去哪儿、飞猪、同程、美团、京东、航旅纵横、高铁管家、滴滴、高德地图、百度地图、腾讯地图等 12 家涉及火车票网络销售业务的主流平台，重点围绕群众反映强烈的网络销售火车票突出问题召开行政约谈会。

During the interview, the Beijing Municipal Administration for Market Regulation clearly put forward four compliance requirements for all platforms: 约谈会上，北京市市场监督管理局向各平台明确提出四项合规经营要求：

    Strictly implement primary and social responsibilities, establish correct business philosophies, and "provide more assistance, less obstruction" for travelers' journeys;

    Thoroughly investigate business models and service processes, prohibit explicit or implicit suggestions that consumers can obtain priority ticket purchasing privileges through paid services, promptly rectify misleading promotions such as "acceleration packages," "dual channels," and "remaining ticket monitoring" after tickets are sold out, and voluntarily accept public supervision;

    Comprehensively investigate and rectify platform pages, remove products suspected of misleading promotion, adjust page promotional content, and prohibit the use of 12306 images, text, trademarks, etc., in promotions that might lead consumers to mistakenly believe there is a specific business cooperation between the platform and 12306;

    Conscientiously implement clear pricing, prominently remind customers of value-added service content and prices, promptly rectify issues where the displayed train ticket price differs from the actual payment due to inconspicuous value-added service prompts, and effectively protect consumers' right to know.

item.title: 12306 新增「低人一等座」提醒
item.description:
According to DENSITY FINANCE, a netizen recently posted that when they were purchasing a high-speed rail ticket, the 12306 APP popped up a warm reminder: 据密度财经消息，日前有网友发文称，自己在购买高铁票时，12306APP 弹出一则温馨提醒：

For this ticket collection, only first-class seats located in the back row of the business class mini-cabin remain (seat back not adjustable, no armrest separating the two seats). 本次取票仅剩位于商务座小舱后排的一等座位（椅背不可调整，双人座中间无隔开扶手）。

Regarding the above situation, a 12306 customer service representative stated that because some first-class seats are located behind the business class cabin, this position is relatively special, so a reminder was added. 对于上述情况，12306 接线客服表示，因为有部分一等座座位是位于商务座舱后的，该位置比较特殊，所以增加了提醒。

At the same time, the customer service explained that if passengers see the prompt and mind purchasing this particular seat, they can cancel the order and repurchase. 同时，该客服解释称，若旅客看到提示，并介意购买此位置，可以取消订单后重新购买。

item.title: 网信部门整治传播无 AI 标识的虚假不实信息问题
item.guid: 网信部门整治传播无-AI-标识的虚假不实信息问题
item.description:
According to the "Wangxin China" WeChat official account, recently, some online accounts have been publishing AI-generated synthetic information without adding AI labels, leading to issues of deceiving and misleading the public with false and untrue content, disrupting the online ecosystem, and causing a negative impact. 据「网信中国」微信公众号消息，近期，部分网络账号发布 AI 生成合成信息时，不添加 AI 标识，存在利用虚假不实内容欺骗误导公众的问题，破坏网络生态，造成恶劣影响。

In response to the above situation, the Cyberspace Administration urged website platforms to conduct thorough investigations and rectifications, lawfully dispose of 13,421 accounts, and clear over 543,000 pieces of illegal and non-compliant information. 对于上述情况，网信部门督促网站平台深入排查整治，依法依约处置账号 13421 个，清理违法违规信息 54.3 万余条。

It is reported that the disposed accounts and content included behaviors such as maliciously gaining traffic by fabricating touching stories and sensational events, and unauthorized selling of AI-generated videos of public figures "sending blessings" or "New Year greetings" (profiting improperly from them). 据悉，处置账号、内容包含借虚构感人故事、猎奇事件恶意博取流量、未经授权售卖 AI 生成的公众人物「送祝福」「拜年」等视频（从中不当牟利）等行为。

The Cyberspace Administration appeals: 网信办呼吁：

We call on all online content creators to actively add AI labels in accordance with relevant regulations, avoid misleading the public, and jointly create a clean and upright online environment.

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》票房进入中国影史前 8
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》票房进入中国影史前-8
item.description:
According to Lighthouse Pro, as of 10:00 AM on February 12th, "Zootopia 2" has accumulated a box office of 4.523 billion yuan, surpassing "Detective Chinatown 3" and entering the TOP8 of China's film history box office chart. 据灯塔专业版消息，截至 2 月 12 日 10 时，《疯狂动物城 2》累计票房 45.23 亿，超过《唐人街探案 3》，进入中国影史票房榜 TOP8。

The list shows that the top three are "Nezha: The Devil Boy Comes into the World" (15.446 billion), "The Battle at Lake Changjin" (5.775 billion), and "Wolf Warrior 2" (5.694 billion). "Zootopia 2" currently surpasses "Detective Chinatown 3" and "Avengers: Endgame". 榜单显示，前三分别为《哪吒之魔童闹海》（154.46 亿）、《长津湖》（57.75 亿）、《战狼 2》（56.94 亿）。而《疯狂动物城 2》目前超过《唐人街探案 3》和《复仇者联盟 4：终局之战》。

"Zootopia 2" was released on November 26, 2025, and became one of the top three films at the Chinese box office in December of the same year. 《疯狂动物城 2》于 2025 年 11 月 26 日上映，并在同年 12 月成为 2025 年中国票房榜前三名。

item.title: 《F1：狂飙飞车》续集确认制作已启动
item.guid: 《F1：狂飙飞车》续集确认制作已启动
item.description:
According to IT Home citing a BBC report, "F1: Overdrive" producer Jerry Bruckheimer confirmed that the film's sequel has officially begun production during the annual Oscar Nominees Luncheon. 据 IT 之家援引 BBC 报道，《F1：狂飙飞车》制片人杰里 · 布鲁克海默在奥斯卡年度午宴期间，确认电影续集已正式启动制作。

It is reported that the production team is currently moving forward with the sequel. However, Bruckheimer did not disclose a specific timeline, nor did he confirm whether Pitt would continue to star, but emphasized that he would definitely be involved in the casting process. 据悉，目前制作团队正在推进续集。但布鲁克海默没有透露具体时间表，也未确认皮特是否会继续出演，而是强调自己一定会参与选角。

The film was released last summer, achieving a global box office of 630 million US dollars, approximately 467 million British pounds, making it the most successful theatrical release among Apple's original film series to date. 影片去年夏天上映，全球票房达到 6.3 亿美元，约合 4.67 亿英镑，成为苹果原创影集之中迄今最成功的院线发行作品。

The film underwent extensive on-location shooting during the 2023 and 2024 F1 seasons, with many scenes directly filmed during real race weekends, including the British Grand Prix at Silverstone Circuit. 影片在 2023 年和 2024 年 F1 赛季期间进行大量实景拍摄，多场戏直接取景于真实比赛周末，包括银石赛道的英国大奖赛。

Bruckheimer stated that he was pleasantly surprised by the film's recognition with multiple awards, including a Best Picture nomination, and that working with Brad Pitt for the first time was an exhilarating experience. 布鲁克海默表示，对影片获得包括最佳影片提名在内的多项奖项认可感到惊喜，与布拉德 · 皮特首次合作是一段令人振奋的经历。

item.title: 《星河入梦》发布新版预告
item.description:
Yesterday, the Spring Festival sci-fi film "Into the Starry Dream" released its "Dream Crisis" version trailer. 昨日，春节档科幻电影《星河入梦》发布「梦境危机」版预告。

It is reported that the film tells the story of the near-future virtual dream system "Good Dream" coming into being, allowing people to do whatever they want in their self-created dreams, but unexpectedly triggering a crisis that endangers reality. Xu Tianbiao, the administrator of "Good Dream," to save the hibernating astronaut Li Simeng, uncovers the truth that her world is a virtual program, and the two travel through more than ten distinct dream worlds to carry out the rescue. 据悉，影片讲述近未来虚拟梦境系统「良梦」问世后，人们可在自主创造的梦中随心所欲，却意外引发危及现实的危机。「良梦」管理员徐天彪为拯救冬眠的宇航员李思蒙，揭穿其所在世界为虚拟程序的真相，两人穿梭于十余个风格迥异的梦境世界展开救援。

The film is executive produced by Fu Ruoqing, directed by Han Yan, written by Qian Ninghuang, Han Yan, Gao Lu, Liu Dalin, Xu Chen, and Ma Peisi, starring Wang Hedi and Song Qian, with Zu Feng and Luo Haiqiong as co-stars, and Wang Duo making a special appearance. It will be released on February 17. 该片由傅若清担任总监制，韩延执导，钱宁黄、韩延、高璐、刘达林、徐忱、马佩斯编剧，王鹤棣、宋茜领衔主演，祖峰、罗海琼主演，汪铎特别出演，将于 2 月 17 日上映。

早报
